overview:
An accomplished business professional with huge experience in tech start ups gained throughout his career in digital telecoms, internet and software industries. Has many years fund raising experience. As a founder of a number of companies he has developed and led them to international market success with many awards, commercial success and industry recognition. An experienced leader in sales, product commercialisation, financial strategy & business planning and all aspects of growing companies to achieve their goals. He has also advised number of technology companies that have used his skills to develop a presence and successfully enter their own markets. He is a committed professional driven by goals.

Specialties International marketing analysis & Sales, Internet technologies, E Commerce, Social Media, Digital Telecom s, BMS Systems & Plastics, product development, financial management, commercialisation, IP law, M & A & MBO’s.
